评论概述: Comfortable and Versatile Wide Leg Pants
评论详情: These DLOODA women’s wide-leg yoga pants are the perfect combination of comfort and style! The high-waisted design is flattering and provides great tummy control, while the loose, wide-leg fit is incredibly comfortable for lounging, yoga, or even wearing to work. The soft fabric feels amazing against the skin and allows for plenty of movement, making them perfect for any casual or active occasion. I love that they come with pockets, adding both practicality and convenience. The versatility of these pants means they can be dressed up or down. Overall, these are a must-have for anyone seeking comfort without sacrificing style!

I like the fit and feel so well, that I ordered several more pairs in assorted colors, and I've decided I'm going to weed out a lot of my other pants and leggings, and wear these as my main pants this winter. Very pleased to have found these at such an affordable price with the black Friday discounts.

I recently picked up a pair of the DLOODA Women's Wide Leg Yoga Pants and have mixed feelings. Let's start with the positives: these pants are incredibly comfortable. The fabric is soft, stretchy, and cozy, making it perfect for lounging or a more casual workday. They’re super breathable, too, which is great for long wear.  However, there are a couple of things to note. First, the pants are quite long, so they tend to drag on the ground if you're on the shorter side (I'm 5'4", and I have to be careful not to trip!). If you don't mind a bit of extra length, this might not bother you, but it takes adjusting if you're not used to it.  Another thing to consider is the high waist. It feels a little unusual initially if you’re not used to that fit. The waistband sits quite high on the natural waist, which is great for support, but it took me a little while to get comfortable. It’s not uncomfortable, just different from typical low-rise or mid-rise options. Once I got used to it, though, I appreciated the added support!  Overall, these are a great pair of pants if you’re looking for something comfy and versatile. Just be aware of the length if you're shorter, and give yourself a little time to get used to the high waist!
Nice fabric.

评论概述: Style and comfort all in one!
评论详情: I love these wide-leg yoga pants! The high waist is super flattering, and the material is incredibly comfortable for either lounging or even running errands. The loose fit gives me the freedom to move around comfortably, and the fact that they have pockets is a huge convenience. These pants have become one of my favorites for both relaxing at home or going out. I 10/10 recommend these for anyone who appreciates both style and comfort!

I'm not sure why I got the XS in these, but there must have been a reason so either that's the best that was available to me or I was convinced by prior reviews to do so. In any case, a small or even a medium would've been way better. Though I'm not sure if I would have liked them still. They are very fitted in the waist and crotch, and then loose in the leg. I think I thought they would be a softer, thicker material based on their use of the term "sweatpants" which these definitely are not. They are a taught yoga pant fabric. The seams are not flattering, the waistband seam is uncomfortable, as is the front seam which gave me CT, and then the whole front made me look like I had an enormous "pooch," so there doesn't seem to be any tummy control for what they are. Just overall weirdly fitting, which is too bad because they are nicely made and they do look nice. I just don't think the cut is right for the fabric they chose, and I really don't know who was in charge of that painful waistband. I'm happy others love these, I just definitely did not and found them to be wholly unflattering. Great length in the pants, though.
So comfortable!  Love these pants

评论概述: Relaxed, comfortable fit and flattering look
评论详情: I ordered the Navy Blue DLOODA Wide Leg Yoga Pants with Pockets in my normal size (XL) after looking at the size chart. The pants fit very well including the length, so I believe they run true to size -- for XL at least. I occasionally have to size up to XXL for some brands of yoga pants, but I'm glad I stayed with my usual size this time. I like the wide legs which contribute to the looseness and flattering look of these pants. I will probably wear them mostly as lounge pants since they are so comfortable, but they look nice enough to wear in many other settings. I would have preferred more tummy control in the waistband, but since the description says stretchy waistband with gentle compression, I will not deduct any stars. The description of the waistband is accurate. These pants appear to be well made.

These are cute and comfortable. They are thinner material so more for the summer, spring or fall. They fit true to size. I ordered my usual size small and they fit just right. The length is perfect for me. I’m 5’4” for reference. I weigh 132 lbs and usually wear a size 2/ 26 in pants. These are a great value for the price.

great flare and soft material nice amount of stretch and nice dark color. Super cute and has side pockets for carrying things minimally . I got a small and it was a bit larger then I would have liked.
The crotch is way too long and the material is very synthetic looking. I have to return it.

评论概述: Smooth Fabric with Light Stretch and Flattering Fit
评论详情: DLOODA Yoga Pants have a very comfortable fit.  Key Features:  - Wide leg cut adds to the comfort - High rise style is flattering and enhances tummy support - The blended fabric has 20% spandex making them quite stretchy - Softness level is perfect - Size and structure of the pockets are awesome - they don't protrude out. - I'm pleased with the length which goes down to the top of my bare feet (I'm 5'7") - The material is smooth and lightweight - ideal for exercising or every day wear - Construction is good - I do not observe any flaws in the stitching - i laundered them in cold water and a low heat dryer - no color bleed and the integrity of the fabric remained unchanged  For your consideration:  Navy color is a dark shade.  The front vertical seam is a little more pronounced than I like. I don't enjoy the feel or look of it. I favor yoga pants with no front seam or a very subtle one.  The overall design, craftsmanship, and quality of the fabric are very good. Nice fit and style, and a good value.
I like the pants
Heavy nylon, have some compression in the waist. Decent pants for the price.

评论概述: Comfy Yoga pants, not too hot or too cold
评论详情: These are great! I use them for wearing around the house, and they are great wide-leg yoga pants that aren't too tight (like some yoga pants are when I order my size); they have pockets that I can fit my phone into, and they don't feel too hot during a yoga session, despite being full-leg. They do have a shininess to them, so despite them saying that they can double as "work pants", the shininess makes them stand out as yoga stretch pants, and they wouldn't work too well at my office... but they're great casual pants and would probably work fine in other workplaces or school environments.

These yoga pants look great and feel well-made, making them perfect for a yoga or gym session. They're not see-through or overly baggy, and they're loose around the thighs preventing chafing. The pockets are also super convenient and easily hold my phone or keys. I usually wear a size 0/2, and the XS size fits well. My main complaint is the combination of a front seam and elastic waistband makes it uncomfortable for long torsos.  When the pants are low enough that the front seam doesn't pull, the elastic waistband pinches since it's not sitting at my waist, and when the pants are pulled high enough that the waistband sits at my waist, the front seam pulls up and gives me camel toe, which is pretty uncomfortable. These pants may work great for small or medium torsos, but since my torso is pretty long, they just don't work great for me.

I really like these pants. The fabric is a slinky, stretchy yoga-pant type material. I love the versatility of these pants, since they can be dressed up or down depending on what shirt I pair with them, and they are excellent for travel. They also have functional pockets. As for sizing, I am 5 foot 7, weigh 175 pounds, have a 36C bust with narrow shoulders, a short torso, and a wide but flat derriere, carry most of my weight in the middle, and wear a US women's size 10 or 30 pants (medium size pants and joggers at Old Navy and H&M), or a woman's 10 or 12 in dresses. I ordered these pants in a large size, and I think the fit is perfect (see my pics). The band doesn't dig into my waist or roll down, and I am not constantly pulling them back up.  I am happy with the quality, fit, and comfort of these pants, and would order again from this brand.

评论概述: Makes the perfect lounge wear and the length is good for petites
评论详情: This pant makes the perfect lounge wear. It is soft and incredibly comfortable. It's my favorite yoga pant at the moment. It's been washed twice now and I have not noticed any shrinkage or discoloration. I try to not over dry my clothes though. The fit is true to size and perfect for petites.
